Description.Text: Malliotakis Beach Hotel is a modern 3-star property offering relaxed accommodation near Malia, Crete. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and a good beachfront location. Malia is a small resort town situated on the north coast of the Greek island of Crete. It is a popular tourist hotspot boasting a large and varied nightclub and bar scene with many hotels, restaurants and gift shops also lining the main strip. There is a fine sandy beach and interesting ancient ruins in the wider area. The hotel is housed in a simple 20th-century mid-rise building. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 20sqm and decorated in a bright, modern style. They feature a garden view. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, fridge, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the pool bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
